rows.label: tev002301_MSG0001
rows.name: So this is your city? Wow! It's really great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0002
rows.name: I've never seen so many people in one place before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0003
rows.name:
I sure do wish Celica and I could take a peek inside
all those shops...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0004
rows.name: But the buildings are so small, I probably wouldn't fit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0005
rows.name:
I always thought my strength would only cause trouble
for people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0006
rows.name:
But what with my new job in the industrial district,
I can use it to help out all my friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0007
rows.name:
I've got to work extra hard so that I can repay
Mr. Chausson for giving me the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0008
rows.name:
You're going off to fight so you can get back
something really important?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0009
rows.name:
The Ganglion are really scary, but I think you're even
stronger than they are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Er, but not muscle strength, exactly. A different type.
Something you humans have that they don't.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0011
rows.name:
So go give 'em what for, and then we'll have a big
party when you return![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0012
rows.name:
Mr. Dalton said that once the Lifehold's up and running
again, lots of humans are gonna come back here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I guess they'll have to build a whole bunch of buildings,
or else the city might overflow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0014
rows.name:
Thing is, I rather like Mr. Dalton.
And Mr. Bernat and Mr. Ryo, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0015
rows.name:
So I'm gonna work real hard to help build lots of
houses for the people who are coming back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG0016
rows.name:
You don't need to worry about the city overflowing.
Go on and wake your sleepyhead friends.
We'll all be snugs as bugs in rugs here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG1001
rows.name:
When Celica watches me, it makes me want to work
even harder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG1002
rows.name:
I really like sitting here. It's nice and squishy and soft.
Do you like it as well?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG1003
rows.name:
The guys gave me a "paycheck" today. I hope Celica
can show me what I'm supposed to do with it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG1004
rows.name:
Ooh, a shooting star! Look, Celica, look!
A shooting star! Right there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev002301_MSG1005
rows.name: Awww... It's gone.[ST:wait ]
